title: Welcome the Traveler
description: "The Gospel According to Al;" a friend of mine, lessons I learned from him

title: Sleep With the Angels [A Deacon's Compline]
description: [Schlaf bei den Engeln / A Grown-Up Lullaby] The title is a gift from my brother-from-another-mother, Jerry Danks. I pray that others may find peace from these lyrics

title: A Believing Thomas
description: A song of Faith & Hope; of Angels & Peace

title: A New Dawn is Alive!
description: An Advent hymn based on Luke 2:8-35

title: Come to Me
description: Believing in Jesus helps bear our burdens. Matthew 11:28-30

title: Don't Take This Lying Down
description: These lyrics are based on all the things I learned while working in shelters: from battered women themselves and those who help them. There's just no excuse for it - Domestic Violence has got to end. Now.

title: Faithful Servant
description: God looks after us. Luke 12:22-32

title: For You Are My People
description: An opinion of our relationship with God.

title: God Gave Me Everything
description: A love song for my bride.

title: Hardships & Trials
description: Following the Way of Jesus may result in difficult times for us. James 1:2-18; 1 Peter 4:12-19; John 15:18-27; 16:1-4

title: Hold On to Each Other
description: An all-purpose rallying song against the injustices of the world. Peace & non-violence: Try it, you'll like it… Inspired by the words and actions of George Harrison, Rev Dr King Jr, Gandhi, Tankman, Obi Wan, and Jesus. We must continue to raise our voices together against injustice!

title: Holy Is His Name [The Magnificat] version 1
description: aka: "Mary's Love Song;" Luke 1:39-56

title: Holy Is His Name [The Magnificat] version 2
description: aka: "Mary's Waltz;" Luke 1:39-56

title: I Miss You Every Lent
description: Performed 'sorta live' at the Lenten Lounge; A broken-hearted, cry-in-your-altar wine love song. I guess.

title: In Your Name
description: The works of followers of Jesus.

title: Jerusalem
description: From Babylon, a cry of hope to return to Jerusalem

title: Keep Out of Reach of Children
description: These lyrics were written from a place deep in my heart; and dedicated to my fellow survivors of clergy sexual abuse

title: Lay Your Weapons Down, Boys
description: A 1960s-type anthem. How very sad that not a day goes by on this planet that we don't have to repeat this mantra...

title: Mrs. Schrader's Garden
description: A delightful tune about St Francis

title: Paradise Bay
description: A sea shanty; a sailor facing his last voyage

title: Psalm 116
description: A song of praise

title: Roses of Dundee
description: A fictional story about a same-sex couple that is the experience of many in this world

title: Say the Word!
description: [The Disciple, the Adultress & the Centurian] Matthew 4:18-22; John 8:1-9; Matthew 8:5-13

title: Silent Prayer (Live)
description: [Lyrics by my mom] Looking after the least, the last and the lost. Sometimes, the best you can do is send up a silent prayer

title: Sister Mary Boniface
description: A life dedicated to educating children
